name: Chicken Caesar Bowl
description: A refreshing combo of grilled chicken, crisp lettuce and zesty dressing is perfect for a one-bowl, beat-the-heat meal; even better if you start with leftover cooked chicken! If you like a little heat, swap in Fajita Seasoning for Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning; both pair well with creamy, garlicky Caesar dressing.

ingredients.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning or Fajita Seasoning

preparation: Meanwhile, in bowl, whisk together dressing mix, mayonnaise, oil, and milk. Using the 2-in-1 Citrus Press, squeeze in juice from lemon.
Brush chicken with oil; sprinkle with seasoning.
Place on grill; reduce heat to medium. Barbecue with lid closed, 6–8 min per side.
Meanwhile, cut tomatoes into wedges and coarsely chop lettuce.
Arrange veggies in bowls; cut chicken into chunky pieces and arrange on top. Drizzle with dressing.
tips: Steam frozen corn in less than 5 min in the Multipurpose Steamer. Fast and easy, with less mess!
Cook once, eat twice. For a speedy roast chicken, microwave Rotisserie Chicken in the Round Steamer for 20 min.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced meal.

products.name: Caesar Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is a little bit of magic: It’s rich, creamy, full of flavor, and it has zero sodium! Take it far beyond Caesar salad and use it as a sauce for pizza, a dip for veggies, chicken fingers, and zucchini fries, or mix it in your white pasta sauce. Simply mix the blend with mayo or Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, and milk, and it’s ready for anything!

products.name: Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: The days of dry oven-roasted chicken that takes forever to make are over! There’s a better way, and it’s quick, juicy, and oh-so-tasty with Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning. In 20 minutes, you can cook a whole chicken in the microwave using the Round Steamer. With a flavour that outshines the store-bought kind—free of unnecessary additives and too much sodium—Rotisserie Chicken is so fast and easy it’s perfect for any night of the week!

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.
